name: Elf
description: Elves are a magical people of otherworldly grace, living in the world but not entirely part of it.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: Elves don't need to sleep. Instead, they meditate deeply for 4 hours a day.

traits.name: Elf Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with longswords, shortswords, shortbows, and longbows.

traits.name: Cantrip
traits.description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

traits.name: Extra Language
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.

traits.name: Elf Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with longswords, shortswords, shortbows, and longbows.

traits.name: Fleet of Foot
traits.description: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.description: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, rain, snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

traits.name: Superior Darkvision
traits.description: Your darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks when you or your target is in direct sunlight.

traits.name: Drow Magic
traits.description: You know the dancing lights cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast faerie fire once per day. At 5th level, you can cast darkness once per day.

traits.name: Drow Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows.
